document_data.mainbody:
Pumpkin soup was a soup whose ingredients consisted primarily of pumpkin, spices, and most often an ingredient that was secret to all but the cook. In the Sword Coast it was considered a traditional dish for the holiday Liars Night.
Pumpkin soup was a thick and creamy soup with taste that made folk think of winter evenings in front of a hot hearth.
Pumpkin soup was the old staple of elven cuisine eaten with a dash of spices in the days of Myth Drannors glory.
